title: Textile, "Imperial Coins", 1957
medium:
Medium: silk and Fortisan
Technique: Plain weave foundation.  Screen printed.
inscribed: Along left edge, ""IMPERIAL COINS " AN EXCLUSIVE SCREEN PRINT" and "(arrow)top". Along right edge,"SCHUMACHER'S SICILIAN GROUP BY Vera"
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 395 x 126.5 cm (12 ft. 11 1/2 in. x 49 13/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 75 x 40.5 cm (29 1/2 x 15 15/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Marion K. Morgan and from General Acquisitions Endowment, Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, and Eleanor G. Hewitt Funds
description: Silver coins on a grey background.
